message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase the product for $13,000. I believe this price reflects the value it holds, especially for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $10,000.  Would you consider $11,500?
